list_definition.definition: a person who controls boxing, football etc matches, makes sure that the rules are not broken etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The referee sent two of the players off the field.

list_definition.definition: a person who is willing to provide a note about one’s character, ability etc, eg when one applies for new job

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Please provide the names of two referees, together with your application form and a CV.

list_definition.definition: to act as a referee for a match

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’ve been asked to referee (a football match) on Saturday.
